Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the daily wage of South Korea's Covid-19 frontline workers.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that frontline workers are paid only $13 as a daily wage.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the mentioned daily wage is the actual wage of frontline workers, when in fact it is an extra allowance to boost morale.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation that the mentioned amount is an extra allowance and not the daily wage of frontline workers.
